mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID as noticeId, TITLE, ORG_FILE_NM as orgFileNm, SAVE_FILE_NM as saveFileNm, EXT, CONTENTS, WRITER_ID as writerId, BRANCH_NM as branchSNm, MOD_DT as modDt, REG_DT as regDt FROM notice WHERE NOTICE_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY NOTICE_ID ASC

SELECT NOTICE_ID as noticeId, TITLE, ORG_FILE_NM as orgFileNm, SAVE_FILE_NM as saveFileNm, EXT, CONTENTS, WRITER_ID as writerId, MOD_DT as modDt, REG_DT as regDt, BRANCH_NM as branchSNm FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( TITLE, ORG_FILE_NM, SAVE_FILE_NM, EXT, CONTENTS, WRITER_ID, BRANCH_NM, MOD_DT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchSNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT b.code_id as codeId , b.code_nm as codeNm , b.num FROM code_type a JOIN code b ON a.code_type_id = b.code_type_id WHERE a.code_type_id = #{codeTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.use_yn = 1 ORDER BY b.num
